website_summaries.verdict: Those wanting to try a LUNA favorite without committing to a bulk buy will appreciate this small pack of peanut and chocolate bars.
pros: Has a smooth texture balanced with bits of crunchy peanuts
Recipe includes 8 grams of protein for those needing energy
Customers appreciate the reasonable sugar serving
cons: Some buyers claimed the company recently changed its Nutz Over Chocolate recipe, which includes less of the vitamin nutrients of the original

customer_reviews.title: Issue with soy protein isolate ingredient
customer_reviews.text: I saw another review that stated the soy protein isolate is extracted using hexane, which is a proven neurotoxin. Since Luna bars are made by Clif bars, this applies to Clif bars, also.
customer_reviews.author: Polack

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Peppermint Stick!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW the chocolate peppermint stick flavor is absolutely delicious!!! I cant even begin to describe how much I love this flavor. Dense moist chocolate flavor with a light pepermint coating, delicious! I dont think ill ever order another flavor. Ive tried the lemon zest, chocolate salted caramel, chocolate dipped coconut and white chocolate macadamia some are better than others but none can conpare to the chocolate peppermint stick! I hope they never stop making this flavor!
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Love the lemon taste and crunchiness, but too high in carbs
customer_reviews.text: I love these for a gluten-free snack. However, when I started trying to limit my carbs, I could no longer eat these because they are high in carbs (23 NET carbs per bar). If you are not worried about carbs, I would suggest trying them. My husband even likes them for their crunchiness - and he's not so much for "health-food bars."
customer_reviews.author: FLNewGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice lemon flavor, w/really sweet icing.
customer_reviews.text: Chewy (not crunchy) bar but I found the thick topping/icing a bit overly sweet, & I don't like anything sticky/that melts for in the car. I'd prefer this without the icing- but otherwise it has a great lemon flavor, not nuts etc that get stuck in teeth... (I'm looking for a great GF car snack: that doesn't melt, leave a crunchy mess in the seat, or melted chocolate in my lap.) This one isn't bad for travel... I typically like Oreos & fig newtons, & life savers: i.e.: I usually like sugar- these were just too "tooth sweet" to me.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bird

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the creamy coating
customer_reviews.text: First, I LOVE LUNA BARS!! I've purchased Peanut Butter, Lemon, Peppermint, Chocolate, etc. I also routinely buy the new Luna Protein bars. BUT, something is wrong with these White Chocolate Macadamia bars. This my 3rd and last box of this type, because the coating is so light that it can barely be tasted. Therefore, the taste of these bars is very BLAND. ALL of the other Luna Bars have a nice, THICK, creamy, tasty coating but, for some reason, these bars barely have any coating at all. I've now tried THREE BOXES and this is my LAST.
customer_reviews.author: SJL-Instructor

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Formula changed to very unhealthy!!!
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula and it is not a health bar any more, only a very unhealthy syrup sweetened cake!!! I have osteoporosis, therefore for many years I was eating the Nuts Over Chocolate Luna bar on a daily basis, because it used to contain 350 milligrams of calcium. Now it has only 69 milligrams. Also, they increased the amount of unhealthy syrup to make it extremely sweet, and reduced the other nutrients as well. I feel cheated and angry and I’m never going to buy a Luna Bar again!!! Unless they apologize and bring back the old and healthy formula.
customer_reviews.author: electronic engineer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Afternoon Pick-me-up
customer_reviews.text: These bars are surprisingly delicious! I was a little wary of lemon flavor since it can be a bit strong or fake tasting in other products. These have pleasant lemon flavor and it doesn't leave that protein powder type aftertaste that most bars have. I feel like I'm eating a lemon dessert and they are great for an afternoon pick-me-up. I got this flavor specifically because while I'm pregnant I get sick from eating any sort of nuts and it's rare to find protein bars without some nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanixus

customer_reviews.title: PALM OIL IS RUINING OUR ENVIRONMENT
customer_reviews.text: Honestly so disappointed with his brand right now. I googled the ingredient palm oil, needless to say it is an extremely valuable ingredient for the rainforest animals. The extraction of palm oil is disintegrating our environment. It is very dangerous for the environment and I wish that all companies would stop using this ingredient. If you support this stand please do not buy this product again. With that said they do taste good, which makes it suck a little... but I’ll definitely be reading the ingredients closer next time I buy something.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lemon!
customer_reviews.text: My mother is starving herself to death since chemo. Age is also a factor. It's been stressful to watch. Getting her to eat is a battle. She ate 3 of these the very first day I introduced her to them, and is still eating them. I'm super grateful! Now, my entire family is hooked on these. It's a healthy substitute for a candy bar. And gluten free is imparitive for me. I'm looking forward to trying a few other flavors. But for now, lemon wins the day.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Bear

customer_reviews.title: I've eaten these for five years !
customer_reviews.text: I usually get tired of something after a few weeks or months, but this bar is still going down with relish and pleasure. I just hope they don't discontinue it, like they did the chocolate chip Luna a few years ago. I have low blood sugar and these have a good balance of carbs, protein, calories and energy umph to get me over the mid afternoon and late evening without making an unhealthy choice. Recommend, along with S'mores, Peanut Butter and Chocolate, and the Coconut Chocolate once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Lovely treat!  They taste like a lemon bar... but better.  I
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly delicious! Hard to believe these aren't full of sugar, but they arent! I had them all before my subscription started! The subscription price is the way to go. On a great sale you might find $1 per. A friend of mine had big time gluten issues and she raves on these things. I put them in the freezer and fridge to substitute for a weak moment when I want an ice cream. Just not great in car, there is a layer of icing on top...decadent. Best to not cook em. Unless you are going for a creative ala mode kinda thing!
customer_reviews.author: SexySadie

customer_reviews.title: Flavortown
customer_reviews.text: Look. These are the best flavor. No stores near me sell this. Instead, they sell the trash flavors like lemon and double chocolate. White chocolate macadamia is flavortown. It’s delicate. It’s soft. The texture is on point. The white chocolate has optimal decadent sweetness. Pair this with coffee and your day is definitely off to the right start.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy Luna bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these lemon zest Luna bars. They do the trick when needing a little snack. I sometimes eat half a bar for breakfast since I’m not a big breakfast eater. I have eaten a few of the other flavors and these are my favorite so far. They are gluten free and made with organic oats. Each bar has 8 grams of protein. I’m in love!!!!!! Please do NOT stop making this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: C Freilich

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, addicted, for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This bar is just right: not too heavy like some protein bars or nutrition bars, not too sweet, not doughy, it's just right. Of course this is not a protein bars so it doesn't give you lots of protein but this one and a coffee - that's your perfect breakfast! Try their blueberry flavor, a little bit sweeter but very tasty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linh D.

customer_reviews.title: yummy lemon-y chewy goodness
customer_reviews.text: For comparatively low sugar, they totally satisfy my sweet tooth. The texture won't be for everyone but it is definitely way better than the sticky grainy texture of a lot of gluten free bars. Also SO much better than those chalky play-doh hard to swallow protein bars. I have difficulty finding bars that my son will also eat, AND checks the casein-free, dairy-free, gluten-free allergy boxes. A really good healthy treat that satisfies my hunger for a good while when I can't break away for a meal and the tummy is rumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Z

customer_reviews.title: Missing bars 🤔
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the box of 15 bars was opened and two bars were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many different flavors of these bars, you just have to find the flavor you enjoy. This is one of my favorites. Great flavor. Lots of protein. Enjoy it with coffee for breakfast occasionally as a change sometimes from my morning protein shake. If you like things with this flavor, you won’t be disappointed. Plus at around $12 this is best price I’ve found anywhere on this product.
customer_reviews.author: bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and gluten free!
customer_reviews.text: I have celiac disease and have alot of trouble finding snacks that dont taste like cardboard. I gave these a try and they are so delicious. I always have at least 2 boxes in stock at my home. My kids even eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent texture
customer_reviews.text: First bar out of the box was like trying to eat a lemon-flavored hockey puck! Hard as a rock. Second bar was the exact opposite ... soft and flavorful, though the lemon doesn't "burst" as you would expect. I have cancelled my Subscribe & Save for this item due to this inconsistency and the lackluster flavor. I cannot recommend this product and would urge you not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lin S.

customer_reviews.title: Short dated
customer_reviews.text: Normally this is my favorite ! But my most recent order came with a short dated expiration. With that being said, rather than rice crispy like texture they were more compact like a granola bar. I’m a texture person so I wasn’t too thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Kylepluse

customer_reviews.title: The Most Delightfully Zesty Bar I've EVER had
customer_reviews.text: If you like lemon cake, you're in for a treat because these bars taste JUST like lemon cake. I love that for a full bar, they only have 8g of sugar (which definitely helps me when I'm trying to stay away from cookies and ice cream). I find it helpful to cut these bars in half and eat some now and a little later for an afternoon pick me up. This is my favorite flavor of all the ones I have tried. It's delightful!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey M

customer_reviews.title: Expired bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars expired well before the date I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Order by itself so it doesn’t arrive damaged
customer_reviews.text: Did not like receiving the package of Luna Bars smashed by a heavy (5#) item shipped on top of it. Obviously those who pack multiple items in one box have little knowledge of how items of heavier weight should be on bottom of package not on top of lighter ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting gluten free bars with only traces of tree nuts and milk.. No coconut. High in fiber & protein.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gluten free bar without nuts & little milk. I am lactose intolerant too. I am not allergic to nuts, but am intolerant I ordered these in just this flavor because their other flavors have more nuts, milk and coconut, I find them very satisfying and the price online is somewhat cheaper than at the grocery store. Also with auto delivery I never run out; supplier has been concientous about regular deliveries and they are packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Taste so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love the nutz over chocolate flavor because it's a great combination of salty and sweet. I eat one bar everyday as a snack during work. I also keep one in my purse to eat while waiting at doctors appointments. I love that Amazon sells 15 count boxes. Target only has 6 count boxes. I've purchased these twice on Amazon and will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great & gluten-free!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Celiac disease, so he can't have any gluten whatsoever. We keep Luna bars on hand for snacks. They are excellent for on-the-go snacks or even for a meal replacement in a pinch (though they don't last as long as a real meal, to me). The lemon zest is our favorite, but I also like the blueberry and even the peppermint. I recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: My toddler and I love sharing these!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom with a picky eater it can be hard to find snacks that are both healthy and tasty. These lemon Luna bars are such a sweet treat whole also providing whole grains and fortified nutrients! I love that these have so many essential vitamins and good for you ingredients while also being indulgent. Instead of eating cupcakes or donuts we now reach for one of these to curb our sweet cravings and my 3 year old loves them too ♡
customer_reviews.author: Ardena

customer_reviews.title: ... know their protein bars but I bought two packs like six months the party or whatever the cases and ...
customer_reviews.text: I know their protein bars but I bought two packs like six months the party or whatever the cases and they were gone within two weeks that’s how good they are or less anyway they are very good I had to stop buying them because of the fact that I would eat more than I needed to and that wasn’t good for me but hey it is what it is those are so good excellent I’d recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Lemon Flavor! ❤️😊
customer_reviews.text: Very lemon flavor and delicious. Texture is perfect, firm but not hard & the bottom has a layer of lemon that is creamy and so yummy but not too sweet, just enough sweetness to make you think you’re cheating but you’re not. I had to eat two because they are that good. I’m definitely ordering these again .. these totally rock!! 😊❤️
customer_reviews.author: Intellighter

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and good for on the go
customer_reviews.text: These are quite tasty! Bought one at the grocery store and liked it enough that I decided to buy a whole pack. Great to throw in my purse and have for breakfast at the office on busy days. None of that gross chalky, artificial protein taste. Legit just tastes like a yummy snack. Plus eating these makes me think of "Crazy Ex Girlfriend" when they freak Darryl out about eating them because he's a man.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey B.

customer_reviews.title: Lemony Goodness
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. They have a tendency to melt the coating a little bit if you're out in the Central CA heat like I am. And that doesn't change the taste or crunch, or great lemony bits at all! My favorite of all the Luna line, it goes well with coffee, water, or by itself any time you need a better snack, half meal or boost to get you through.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Workman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Really good price for a big box of these especially considering what I pay for 1 of these at the store. This is my favorite flavor so I’m praying I don’t get sick of it by the time I get to the end of these! Super convenient grab and go protein, no gross/weird protein bar texture.
customer_reviews.author: quinnsmom

customer_reviews.title: I love the lemon zest flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the lemon zest flavor, they are by far my favorite type of protein/granola bar. I often eat them for breakfast or as an afternoon snack. Some of the other flavors are ok, but most of them really taste like a protein bar (which to me isn't great). The lemon zest is just delicious, it reminds me of a lemon-flavored cookie with a rice crispy treat- texture.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Probably my second-favorite of the line.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the mac nuts are probably better, but I have an issue with fatty nuts presenting problems, so these are my second favorite as of now. Someone managed to make great granola bars with none of my food allergens. One regret is the use of saturated fats like palm oil. Would prefer to see a lower-fat version.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pacher

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! They are so delicious and not crazy unhealthy. I cant even explain how good and satisfying these are to my taste buds. They taste like a lemon maraigne pie topped with blueberries. I definitely recommend!! I can't wait to try the peanut butter fudge ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding. They don’t upset your stomach and they don’t taste like concrete
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: ... of protein bars and these are BY FAR my favorite. Great lemon taste and the texture is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried probably 20 different brands/flavors of protein bars and these are BY FAR my favorite. Great lemon taste and the texture is not icky like most of them. I have actually had times where I CRAVE these when I am out! If you like lemon and need the protein, give them a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor and a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is hard to find in stores, especially in this quantity and for this price! I've ordered several of these boxes over the last 8 months and each one came packaged well, no damage, not expired or melted. I'm super happy with this purchase and am definitely buying more in a month or so!
customer_reviews.author: Jen k

customer_reviews.title: I pretty much dont like any health bars
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much dont like any health bars. My mom found this one and said she really thought I would like it. Not nearly as chalky tasting as any of the others I have had and I really enjoy the taste. This one was a winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: need to edit contents of ad to reference made for women
customer_reviews.text: the absolute only reason i didn't rate this higher is because there isn't any mention in the amazon ad these bars are made for women. the bars taste great but i purchased these for my dad. if ad had referenced for women, i would have purchased a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Judson

customer_reviews.title: Luna Bars to the Rescue!
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat much, so when my energy level starts to crash, I need protein and quick. These peppermint bars taste great and fit the bill. They don't have any residual protein taste either. I always carry a couple in my purse for emergency situations. Another plus, I never run out due to my monthly subscription. If you find my review helpful, please indicate so by using the voting buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Luna bar well done
customer_reviews.text: I dont indulge in much chocolate. Especially for avoiding too much sugar etc. But this bar has the right amount of flavor and it's low glycemic. Luna has done well. And will continue to buy while the price is right. Gluten free, and NonGmo bar sounds right. Also luna has other great flavors. Lemon, coconut.
customer_reviews.author: unitedfixedgear

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Order !
customer_reviews.text: This product has been purchased by me (the writer) in a grocery store which I loved! I thought at this time of all of our lives, it would be easier to purchase online - but.....there is no freshness and apparently due to the lateness of the package.....it had been sitting somewhere VERY HOT - the top "lemon zest" coating seemed to have melted and the packaging itself was sticky and gooey and the bar itself had no lemon flavor left - we each had one and then the rest (13 BARS!) are going into the trash or outside for the animals!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Goodman

customer_reviews.title: So yummy and filling yet healthy
customer_reviews.text: My fav snack if you’re a lemon lover this is for you
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Love the LUNA
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing LUNA bars years ago for myself. My kids got a hold of them one day and it has been hard to keep them in stock at my house ever since. The lemon bar has a tasty sweet flavor, which my youngest loves. If he had his way, he'd eat them for meals and snacks. Great for quick snacks on the go, in school bags, and busy days at home.
customer_reviews.author: MN MOM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dessert Bar That is Not Too Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I am gluten and dairy free by necessity and these are a nice change from all the nut bars stuck together with dates or honey that I also eat. They have a peanut butter base coating that is creamy enough you think there is dairy in it. My son really liked them as well. They are more of a dessert bar in my opinion but not too sweet. I like them but not as well as some of the other Kind bars I eat regularly. They are filling.
customer_reviews.author: K. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious; the taste makes them feel like an indulgence. Buying them in this qty with a subscribe and save discount makes them WAY cheaper than I could buy them locally too! It's a win win
customer_reviews.author: ATXMomma

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lemon
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this bar in a vending machine at work which was a couple of floors away. They are delicious, lemon is my favorite. I was delighted when I found them on Amazon. I first bought three boxes, one for my daughter, one for my coworkers and one for myself. I have and will buy them again..
customer_reviews.author: JUNE J.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Gluten Free-not freaky
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting GF treat/snack ever. Some gf stuff has off tasting flour mixes, while some “healthy” snack bars taste like Euell Gibbons made it out of pine cones. You’d never know this was any sort of special diet kind of item. I miss a lot of things since I’ve had to go gf - this is plain good (esp., if you aren’t worried about sugar intake).😁
customer_reviews.author: Aardvark

customer_reviews.title: Good vegan bar.
customer_reviews.text: I eat one in the morning with coffee. Satisfying for a quick meal and 8G protein.
customer_reviews.author: Dieter R. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Inquire about expiration dates before buying
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 15 pkg of bars on 26 May 2020, received the bars quick enough and they are delicious. I gave this two stars as the product has a best by date of 5 June 2020, which is only 10 days from purchase. Need better quality control
customer_reviews.author: fibrequeen911

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: These things are delicious. I have to be careful not to eat too many at once! I used to eat these a lot years ago and then stopped for some reason... I saw them again in the subscribe and save section and added them and man, they’re just as yummy as ever! I haven’t tried the other flavors, but I love these so much I don’t really feel the need to. :)
customer_reviews.author: sammfak

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!!
customer_reviews.text: The best lemon flavored bar I’ve ever tasted I can’t get enough. I could eat one every day with no problem!! If you like lemon look no further!!
customer_reviews.author: JMLMT

customer_reviews.title: love these, quick breakfast or snack
customer_reviews.text: If you like lemon flavor (more on the sweet side and less on the tart), and you like the "rice crispy" texture, then you'll probably like these a lot. I appreciate the value when these are priced below grocery store prices. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pan

customer_reviews.title: Love the lemon flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I go thru a box a month. Use them for day hike snacks or when I miss a meal during the day or as an afternoon snack. Great lemon flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Rose C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Lemony
customer_reviews.text: I loved the extremely lemony flavor and the texture, but they were a little expensive to keep them in my pantry all the time and couldn't anyways since they are consistently unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Full of flavor
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. These bars taste so good, the blueberry and lemon flavors are great together. Don’t leave them out where its hot or they will melt.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hinton

customer_reviews.title: my go to snack
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many that it seems once a year I get a bad batch (from Target and Walmart). What I got from Amazon was fine actually. When they are bad, a whole box will have a moldy/chemical taste. When their quality control is working, they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best protein bars
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Luna Bars and began by eating the Nutz Over Chocolate flavor. Then I bought some Cookies n Cream and Chocolate Peppermint Stick bars. The former 2 are good, but the Chocolate Peppermint is just delicious!! By far one of my favorite more healthy snacks.. and since it's chocolately I don't crave unhealthier options. Also, the subscribe and save is a great deal if you eat them regularly. I have trouble finding them for under $1/bar in stores. I thought I'd also list my 2 other favorite protein bars that are about as good as this one (though it depends on my mood): Zone cookie dough bars, Snickers Marathon bars-multigrain flavor
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great, healthy snack or meal replacement I feel good about! They’re not too sweet, protein, just right!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 WW Points!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in stores, especially at this price. Great for diabetics like me, as I need something in my purse at all times. Great taste, and perhaps not the best 'protein bar' out there, at least they don't taste like cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hargis-Hattendorf

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: This product has a great lemon zest taste and is a perfect delicious and healthful treat! A go-to snack or meal replacement. Not crunchy, this is more of a chewy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: LUNA bars are my favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the Luna bar flavors...Lemon is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious and nutritious for an energy bar
customer_reviews.text: I love the lemon flavor and immediate energy I feel after devouring one on the go! You get a great price buying 15 at a time and I keep them in the fridge during the summer since the heat can cause them to soften a littel too much.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Filling and taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a busy Mama with 3 young kids so I am always skipping meals and then binging on whatever I can find. These bars are the perfect solution! I am a chocolate lover but I am surprised to say that the lemon are my favorite flavor so far! They are filling and SO much better than some of those tiny little snack bars that make you feel like you had 2 bites.
customer_reviews.author: Annie S

customer_reviews.title: finally, a fiber bar that tastes awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to preface this review b saying I'm a VERY VERY picky eater. I've tried a few fiber bars and they just tasted blahh. I bought one of these Luna bars on a whim to try. I'm psyched I tried it because I bought this 15 count box shortly after! These bars are delicious, nutricious, and filling! It doesn't have that "fake" chocolate task and the peppermint is yummy. I DEFINITELY recommend these to a women needed a snack throughout her work day!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor there is
customer_reviews.text: If you love peppermint bark or chocolate mint you'll love these Luna bars. I cannot get enough of them they are easily my favorite flavor I would reccomend these to anyone who loves Luna bars.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: They are good, just prefer stronger lemon flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard problem finding a strong lemon flavor in snacks/cookies etc. these are no different. I’m the only one in my family that can only eat my cheesecake because no one else (restaurants included) that add enough lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Luna bars are my favorite protein/granola bars and the lemon is an amazing flavor. Excellent for a mid-morning hunger pang craving. Also was very helpful in the middle of the night when baby woke up for a feeding. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KD 44

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since peanut butter cups.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually a fan of protein or supplement bars as they tend to taste chemically and fake. But holy cow. These chocolate peppermint stick Luna bars are pretty spectacular. They taste wonderful and are pretty easy on the digestive system if you're having some problems. I was pretty sick for a few months, and these were the pretty much the only things that would stay down (too much information?). I loved them before and I still love them even now I can eat again. Moral of the story: don't think too hard about trying these. They're delicious and filling and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: BrightestPickle

customer_reviews.title: I love LUNA Bars
customer_reviews.text: Great snack bars that taste good, the whole family loves them and they are Gluten Free. I highly recommend all LUNA Bars - I have not tasted a LUNA Ba that isn't delicious. Plus, I love that LUNA Bar is supporting the USWNT!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Matte

customer_reviews.title: Good price and tasty gluten free snack
customer_reviews.text: Good price and tasty gluten free snack. (Thinks rice crispy treat with chopped nuts and chocolate! YUM) I purchase with other items on subscribe and save for best price. I carry these when I am not sure what will be available to eat or at home when I have missed a meal due to a project or activity.
customer_reviews.author: J. McL

customer_reviews.title: It's a dessert!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Luna bar with a dessert topping! Makes me feel like I'm being bad and getting my vitamins at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So good I keep coming back for more
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally like protein bars, but these taste more like a desert or a treat than a protein bar. These have become my go-to snack when I need a pick-me-up or can't get a meal in right away. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hill

customer_reviews.title: tasty and gluten free
customer_reviews.text: if you can do oats this is a tasty bar to take along, there has to be a way to make a Gluten free lemon bar and Amazon had a wonderful large mix for that, I would get that for home baking as these do have oats and are more expensive. but they are tasty and can work on the plan.
customer_reviews.author: aloma d alber

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor perfect for quick bite.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is really good and the bar holds the flavor even after being left in the car in the sun. I would not advise to put them in the fridge or freezer because the flavor and texture is strange when the bar gets really cold.
customer_reviews.author: spike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's all time favorite snack bar! I had to buy it for him when it popped up on my ads. I don't like that the ads pop up, but in this case .. I'm glad. When he came over and saw the box .. he LIT UP! He asked if they were for him and when I said yes, he got so excited! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ska

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and filling!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect when you're hungry and don't want to grab a Snickers bar. Filling! A lightly sweet lemon taste (for those a fan of lemon cookies this is perfect!) And healthy for a working woman! Or a mom who also wants a quick snack for herself 👍😊
customer_reviews.author: Briggsadoon

customer_reviews.title: A nice light breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: I eat one every morning for breakfast. I love the lemon flavor. Light and not too sweet first thing in the morning. Later in the day I could eat chocolate or the chocolate and coconut but lemon is best for breKfast.
customer_reviews.author: mimirocks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flavor of Luna bars. I wasn't sure at first if I would like them but the peppermint is very light and not over whelming. It reminds me a little of Thin Mint Girl Scout cookies. Don't get me wrong, Thin Mints are better, but for a snack bar on the healthy side, these are really good if you like mint-y things.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Davis

customer_reviews.title: Palm Oil
customer_reviews.text: Palm oil is cheap, but terrible for the environment to produce. I won’t be buying Luna bars until they change the recipe. I’m very sad!
customer_reviews.author: S. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great flavor. There are other flavors, but lemon is my favorite. Warning- they are messy if they get too hot(for example left in a hot car).
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price & Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, if I am buying this product, I am already a fan. It's the reasonable price of the product and the speed of delivery that is the star when buying this product from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Elise in Palm Springs

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, better texture than expected
customer_reviews.text: I usually can’t stand this type of bar. But these have a much better texture, kinda like rice crispie bottom, with a delicious lemon frosting on top.. very good cold too.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Fresh.  They are really tasty
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the white chocolate flavor. They taste really good cold/ refrigerated. These were fresh. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love the lemony taste
customer_reviews.text: This bar is the perfect supper meal. I replace my supper with a luna bar and the weight is staying off. It gives you that sugar you need to get through the night and feels you up with a big glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: Zenjon

customer_reviews.title: Nice as a snack
customer_reviews.text: I carry one in my purse for when I get hungry during the day but don't want to eat junk food. 12 grams of protein and a nice lemon flavor without being too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and filling.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! This is a somewhat healthier snack to send in lunch buckets and keep in my desk. It offers a nice flavor and a protein kick to hold us over between meals. Store prices vary from $1 to $1.60 each, unless you are in a convenience store! I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.M. in U.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Delicious high protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I didn't use to be such a chocolate person, but I guess pregnancy and post-baby hormones will change that. I wanted a bar that would be good for quick eating while nursing and on the go and these do the trick! They have a lot of protein and taste delicious. They have an excellent chocolate mint flavor and great consistency. The white part flakes off a little, so you have to be careful in the car not to stain clothing, but it's well worth it. I'll even eat half as a little chocolate treat. I figure it's healthier than a chocolate bar and just as satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: flutacious7

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good.... but not like White Chocolate or Macadamia
customer_reviews.text: It filled a sweet craving, at least. But aside from kind of a syrupy sweet vanilla flavor, I didn't detect white chocolate or macadamia. Kind of a uniform sweet chewy bar experience. Not bad, certainly not unpleasant. Just... not in the realm as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: The bars are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I love LUNA Bars. These bars taste great - my whole family loves them. And they are Gluten Free which I have to have due to an allergy. Plus, I love that LUNA is supporting our USWNT - Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Matte

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: Convenient meal replacement for when you're too busy or on the road. Tastes great and is healthy. Came fresh and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ji

customer_reviews.title: Going looney for Luna Bars
customer_reviews.text: I like all the Luna bar products but the lemon is far and away my favorite. Great flavor. Just a hint of sweet. This bar fills you up and kills the hunger pangs. Healthy option for those who want it but it is so good it seems decadent.
customer_reviews.author: The VERGE

customer_reviews.title: Bomb!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My fave!!!! Great for anytime of the day, I eat them whenever. Satisfies my both hunger and sweet tooth.
customer_reviews.author: ezralea

customer_reviews.title: Dried out chocolate doesn’t stick to bar. Taste bad
customer_reviews.text: I hope this box of bars was just a bad batch. Cause I love these nuts over chocolate bars. But the chocolate has flaked of the bar so it falls off when you open it or bite it. Then it melts into my clothes leaving chocolate stains. Amazon is sending me a new box, fingers crossed they are back to usually quality.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far our favorite flavor Luna bar. We have them on subscribe and save because we each take one in our lunch. The price is much better than the grocery stores. We eat gluten free, and these fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Daffodil

customer_reviews.title: Great treat!
customer_reviews.text: YUM! I love these for dessert. I'm diabetic, & these are yummy but don't do crazy things to my blood sugar. I'm on my second order. Their other flavors are good, too. I'm a Luna fan!🙂
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: our favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite go-to snack for the whole family. Gluten-free, under 200 calories and the taste is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: ChasingEase

customer_reviews.title: Love lemon Bars
customer_reviews.text: I love lemon bars; so, these are fairly good for GF food. I did get them for traveling since I can't find something in every place we go. These are not too dry or crumbly.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Amaaaazing taste!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these lemon bars! They are flavorful without being sweet. And they don't have any nuts (I'm severely allergic), which is hard to find in such bars. Must have these always on hand for a quick and (relatively) healthy snack!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Porretto

product_meta.title: LUNA BAR - Gluten Free Bars - Nutz Over Chocolate Flavor - (1.69 Ounce Snack Bars, 6 Count)
product_meta.description: LUNA Whole Nutrition Bars are crafted to help keep you nourished throughout your busy day and give you the energy to break through. The bars are delicious, gluten-free, vegan snacks that are perfect between meals.
feature_bullets: MORE OF THE STUFF YOU WANT: 9g protein and a low-glycemic index.
LESS OF THE STUFF YOU DON’T: Gluten free, with no artificial flavors or high-fructose corn syrup.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Plant-based, complete protein from soy provides essential amino acids. Carbohydrates come from organic oats and a blend of sugars with a low-glycemic index.
DELICIOUS FLAVORS AND VARIETY: LUNA Bars come in twelve craveable flavors.
CONVENIENCE: Wholesome, delicious on-the-go vegan snacks for energy whenever and wherever you need it

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
